## Disclaimer

## Who is Paraidomat?

- Networking Engineer
- Cisco CCNA (R+S, SP), Cisco CCNP (R+S, SP)
- A guy with a love for:
  - Linux
  - open source software
  - REST APIs, if they are done well ;-)
  - Avionics
  - Rock climbing
